DOC.brief_summary: The objective trial compare lung function profile daily treatment tiotropium+olodaterol FDC [ 2.5/ 5µg 5/ 5µg ] deliver RESPIMAT lung function profile twice daily treatment fluticasone propionate+salmeterol FDC [ 250/50µg 500/50µg ] deliver Accuhaler® 6 week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Characterization Lung Function Profile Inhaled Tiotropium + Olodaterol Fixed Dose Combination Compared Fluticasone Propionate + Salmeterol Fixed Dose Combination COPD Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Diagnosis chronic obstructive pulmonary disease 2 . Relatively stable airway obstruction postbronchodilator 30 % < /= Forced Expiratory Volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) < 80 % predict normal postbronchodilator FEV1/ ( Forced Vital Capacity ) FVC < 70 % 3 . Male female patient , 40 year age old 4 . Smoking history 10 pack year 5 . Ability perform technically acceptable pulmonary function test maintain record 6 . Ability inhale medication competent manner RESPIMAT Inhaler , Accuhaler meter dose inhaler ( MDI ) Exclusion criterion : 1 . Significant disease COPD 2 . COPD exacerbation require treatment antibiotic , systemic steroid ( oral iv ) hospitalization last 3 month . 3 . Clinically relevant abnormal lab value 4 . History asthma 5 . Diagnosis thyrotoxicosis 6 . Diagnosis paroxysmal tachycardia 7 . History myocardial infarction 8 . Unstable lifethreatening cardiac arrhythmia 9 . Hospitalization heart failure within past year 10 . Known active tuberculosis 11. malignancy patient undergone resection , radiation therapy chemotherapy within last five year 12 . History lifethreatening pulmonary obstruction 13 . History cystic fibrosis 14 . Clinically evident bronchiectasis 15 . History significant alcohol drug abuse 16 . History thoracotomy pulmonary resection 17. oral patch ßadrenergics 18 . Oral corticosteroid medication within 6 week prior Visit 1 19 . Regular use daytime oxygen therapy one hour per day 20 . Pulmonary rehabilitation program six week prior screen visit 21 . Investigational drug within one month six half life ( whichever great ) prior screen visit 22 . Known hypersensitivity ßadrenergic drug , BAC , EDTA 23 . Pregnant nursing woman
